mapper.select: select * from users where USER_ID = #{userId} and STATUS ='Y'
mapper.insert: insert into users (USER_NO, USER_ID, USER_PW, USER_NICKNAME, USER_NAME, USER_PHONE, USER_EMAIL, USER_BIRTH, USER_GENDER, STATUS, IS_ADMIN, JOIN_DATE, USER_COMMENT, USER_CREATOR_RANK,USER_PLAN, USER_PROFILE ) values (user_seq.nextval, #{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userNickname}, #{userName}, #{userPhone}, #{userEmail}, #{userBirth}, #{userGender}, 'Y', 'N', sysdate, default, default, default, 'DEFAULT_IMG.JPG')
mapper.select: SELECT c.content_title, c.VIEWS, c.content_no, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM likes l2 WHERE l2.content_no = c.content_no) AS like_count FROM content c JOIN likes l ON c.content_no = l.content_no WHERE l.user_no =#{id} GROUP BY c.content_no, c.content_title, c.views
select content.*,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM likes WHERE likes.content_no = content.content_no) AS like_count from content where user_no=#{userNo}
